page.title: 10DUNNINGS OF WEYHILL.
page.content: A.J.Dunning & Sons Ltd is the largest company in the area and occupies part of the site of the old Weyhill Fairground. The company operates all over the south of England & employs about a thousand in the Building & Shopfitting divisions. Employees come mainly from outside Weyhill, local recruitment of staff being difficult. Dunnings also farm 2000 acres, mostly arable,in the area. We spoke to the Chairman, Mr Victor Dunning, whose father co-founded the firm 60 years ago. Mr Dunning is 83 & has lived in Weyhill since he was 16. Born at Penton & educated locally, he has been on the Church Council for 60 years and says he enjoys living in Weyhill. He considers Weyhill to be primarily an industrial area though our land-cover survey shows it to be largely agricultural.
